# `findInteractionChangedGenes`

findInteractionChangedGenes


## Description

Identifies cell-to-cell Interaction Changed Features (ICF),
 i.e. genes that are differentially expressed due to interactions with other cell types.


## Usage

```r
findInteractionChangedGenes(...)
```
